theorem summatory_divisor_sigma_asymptotics_pos: fixes \<alpha> :: real assumes \<alpha>: "\<alpha> > 0" "\<alpha> \<noteq> 1" defines "\<zeta> \<equiv> Re (zeta (\<alpha> + 1))" shows "sum_upto (divisor_sigma \<alpha>) =o (\<lambda>x. \<zeta> / (\<alpha> + 1) * x powr (\<alpha> + 1)) +o O(\<lambda>x. x powr max 1 \<alpha>)"
